zh: 我要去公园。

en: I like to go to the park and watch the children in the playground enjoying themselves.
zh: 我喜欢去公园，看游乐场里的孩子们玩耍。

en: I saw him in the park.
zh: 我在公园里见过他。

en: I found the lost ball in the park.
zh: 我在公园里找到了丢失的球。

en: I met Ken at the park.
zh: 我在公园里遇到了 Ken。

en: I explained to the host that I had been delayed by a traffic jam.
zh: 我向主人解释说，我因为交通堵塞而耽搁了。

en: My leg was broken in a traffic accident.
zh: 我的腿在交通事故中骨折了。
